text: Canton, Michigan is a township in Wayne County in the U.S. state of Michigan. As of the 2020 census, the township had a population of 98,659. The FBI decided that it is the 20th safest city in the United States. The average household in Canton earns $84,000 dollars. == References == Category:Charter townships in Michigan Category:1834 establishments in Michigan Territory
title: Canton Township, Michigan
